findings.title: Potential Precision Loss in the effectiveSecondsStaked
findings.description: Division takes place before multiplication, potentially leading to precision loss.

findings.title: QSP-5 initialize Functions Can be Frontrun
findings.description: The initialize function can be called by anyone, allowing an attacker to initialize the contract before the legitimate deployer.

findings.title: Unbounded loops
findings.description: The loops are not bound to a safe-max number of iterations, which can lead to unreasonable gas prices and non-conformity with block size limits.

findings.title: Insecure use of _beforeTokenTransfer hook
findings.description: Instead of overriding transfer and transferFrom to add a call to preTransferAdjustWithheldLiquidity function, it is recommended to simply use the _beforeTokenTransfer hook.
